title: The ONE Group uses togrp.com domain for business email communications
statement: The ONE Group operates multiple business email addresses using the togrp.com domain for reservations, business inquiries, loyalty, marketing, press, and careers.

citations.quote: Reservations: togreservations@togrp.com Business: info@togrp.com Loyalty: loyalty@togrp.com Marketing: TOG_Marketing_All@togrp.com Press: press@togrp.com Careers: careers@togrp.com
